title: Number of Dollar Tree stores in Canada by province 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Province in the x axis and Number of stores in the y axis.
Province Ontario has the highest Number of stores and Manitoba has the lowest Number of stores.
The highest Province Ontario has 97.0 more Number of stores than the lowest Province Manitoba.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Province, and Number of stores in each Province on the y axis.
The Number of stores is appeared to be the highest at Province Ontario and lowest at Province Manitoba.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Province in the x axis and Number of stores in the y axis.
Province Ontario has the highest Number of stores and Manitoba has the lowest Number of stores.
The highest Province Ontario has 97.0 more Number of stores than the lowest Province Manitoba.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Province, and Number of stores in each Province on the y axis.
The Number of stores is highest at Province Ontario and lowest at Province Manitoba.
Province British Columbia has the second highest value for Number of stores.
The maximum Province Ontario has got 8.46 times higher Number of stores than the minimum Province Manitoba.
The Province Ontario has the highest Number of stores, followed by British Columbia, and Alberta. Down to the Province Manitoba which is the lowest.
The Province Ontario tends to be 2.44 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Provinces, we get total 225.0.
